name: Giant Vulture
description: Large bird of prey with bald head, hooked beak, and sharp talons. Notable wingspan over 10 feet.
memorable: Aggressive scavenger that hunts in groups and attacks weakened prey.
goals: Primarily scavenges carrion but will attack if provoked or opportunity arises.
relations: Often found in groups, potentially with other large scavenger birds.
environment: Deserts or savannahs, often seen circling high in search of carrion.
strengths: Keen senses for detecting carrion and advantage on attacks when in proximity to allies.
weaknesses: Low armor class and hit points make it vulnerable to focused attacks.
attacks: Uses beak and talons to deal piercing and slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Carrion Sense allows it to locate dead creatures and undead within 60 feet.
senses: Possesses Keen Sight and Smell, granting advantage on perception checks based on these senses.
skills: Notably proficient in perception with a +3 bonus, demonstrating acute awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Uses Pack Tactics to gain advantage on attack rolls against nearby foes.
Defensive Bile ability deters melee attackers by causing damage and incapacitation.
Intelligent yet malevolent, known for haunting weakened prey.
Striking features include sharp talons and a notable wingspan.
Can attack with both beak and talons in a single turn.
test_queries: large aggressive scavenging bird with talons
giant bird that hunts in groups
vulture with keen sense of smell
bird that attacks weakened prey and flies
